TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ServicePartitionResolutionChangeHandler(FabricClient source, long handlerId, ServicePartitionResolutionChange args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ServicePartitionResolutionChangeHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

param.name: source
param.para: A reference to the instance receiving the endpoint change event.

param.name: handlerId
param.para: The ID returned from when the handler was registered.

param.name: args
param.para: Event arguments containing details for the event. .

summary.para: A delegate type for client-side callbacks that are made to user code when the endpoints of a service change or an exception is encountered during the process of updating endpoint information at runtime.
